name: Brainstorm 3 Trivia Game | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
Video & video.

	Video cassette, video game, video tape etc.

Sugar & sugar.

	Sugar beet, sugar candy, sugar cane etc.

String & string.

	String along, string bean, string orchestra etc. A string quartet is an instrumental ensemble consisting of two violins, one viola and one cello.

Sweet & sweet.

	Sweet pea, sweet shop, sweet potato etc. A sweet william is a widely cultivated Eurasian plant with flat clusters of white, pink, red or purple flowers.

Solar & solar.

	Solar eclipse, solar panel, solar power etc. Solar plexus is the network of sympathetic nerves situated behind the stomach that supply the abdominal organs.

questions.text: - bottom, - cake, - climbing, - garden, - salt, - steady
questions.explanation:
Rock & rock.

	Rock bottom, rock cake, rock climbing etc.

questions.text: - broth, - egg, - mist, - tape, - terrier, - woodcock
questions.explanation:
Scotch & scotch.

	Scotch broth, Scotch egg, Scotch mist etc. Scotch woodcock is hot toast spread with anchovies and topped with creamy scrambled eggs.

questions.text: - count, - group, - money, - poisoning, - pressure, - test, - vessel
questions.explanation:
Blood & blood.

	Blood count, blood group, blood money etc.

questions.text: - cap, - certificate, - mask, - penalty, - Valley, - wish
questions.explanation:
Death & death.

	Death certificate, death mask, death penalty etc. Death cap is a poisonous woodland fungus.

Small & small.

	Small arms, small change, small fry etc. The small hours are the early hours of the morning, after midnight and before dawn.

Pressure & pressure.

	Pressure cooker, pressure gauge, pressure point etc. Pressure cabin is a pressurized chamber of an aircraft or spacecraft.

Second & second.

	Second childhood, second hand, second fiddle etc.

Third & third.

	Third man, third party, third world etc. Third degree is torture or bullying to extort confessions or information.

Yellow & yellow.

	Yellow-belly ( coward ), yellow fever, yellow pages etc.

Traffic & traffic.

	Traffic cop, traffic jam, traffic light etc.

Young & young.

	Young blood, young man, Young Pretender ( Bonnie Prince Charlie 1720-88, pretender to the British throne. ) Young Turk is a rebellious member of an organization, political party etc.

Chain & chain.

	Chain gang, chain letter, chain mail etc.

Soft & soft.

	Soft drink, soft fruit, soft option etc.

Table & table.

	Table napkin, table tennis, table wine. Table Mountain is a mountain in South Africa overlooking Cape Town and Table Bay.

Highland & highland.

	Highland cattle, Highland dress, Highland fling etc.

Chicken & chicken.

	Chicken breast, chicken feed, chicken out etc.

Strawberry & strawberry.

	Strawberry blonde, strawberry bush, strawberry tree etc. Strawberry mark is a red birthmark.

Stage & stage.

	Stage direction, stage door, stage fright etc.

Evening & evening.

	Evening class, evening dress, evening primrose ( plant that has yellow flowers that open in the evening.)

Show & show.

	Show business, show stopper, show up etc. Hope you enjoyed the quiz. If you found it too easy then there are plenty of other Quizzical quizzes for your enjoyment.
